Package org.ten60.netkernel.xml.representation

Interface Summary
IAspectDOM An aspect with an org.w3c.dom DOM inside
IAspectJDOM JDOM Aspect Interface
IAspectNodeList An aspect with a set of org.w3c.dom.Node
IAspectSAX An aspect that can generate SAX2 events to a client
IAspectStAXReader An immutable interface for a StAX Aspect
IAspectXDA Interface for aspects containing XDA data model.
IAspectXmlObject An aspect to support the Apache XmlBean object model.
IXAspect

JDOMSAXAspect A SAX content hanlder for JDOM
SAXFilterAspect A SAX Filter Aspect - dynamically connects parents as the SAX chain is evaluated
